00058             function    select_messages( $Start , $Limit , $Field = false , $Order = false )
00059             {
00060                   try
00061                   {
00062                         $Security = get_package( 'security' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00063                         $Start = $Security->get( $Start , 'integer' );
00064                         $Limit = $Security->get( $Limit , 'integer' );
00065                         
00066                         $Database = get_package( 'database' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00067                         if( $Field === false )
00068                         {
00069                               $Results = $Database->select( 
00070                                     '*' , 'umx_error_log' , "1 = 1 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT $Start , $Limit"
00071                               );
00072                         }
00073                         else
00074                         {
00075                               $Field = $Security->get( $Field , 'command' );
00076                               $Order = $Security->get( $Order , 'command' );
00077                               $Order = $Order === 'ascending' ? 'ASC' : 'DESC';
00078                               $Results = $Database->select( 
00079                                     '*' , 'umx_error_log' , "1 = 1 ORDER BY $Field $Order LIMIT $Start , $Limit"
00080                               );
00081                         }
00082                         return( $Results );
00083                   }
00084                   catch( Exception $e )
00085                   {
00086                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00087                   }
00088             }
00089       }
